briefTitle: Breast Cancer and Quality of Life
officialTitle: Impact of Breast Cancer on Quality of Life of the Young Women, Her Life Partner and Her Couple
primaryOutcomeMeasure: quality of life at different time of medical follow up
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* age \< 45
* non metastatic breast cancer
* at least 6 months of relationship

Exclusion Criteria:

* no life partner
* inclusion criteria failure
